entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
